title: Between order and chaos
abstract: What is a pattern? How do we come to recognize patterns never seen before? Quantifying the notion of pattern and formalizing the process of pattern discovery go right to the heart of physical science. Over the past few decades physics’ view of nature’s lack of structure—its unpredictability—underwent a major renovation with the discovery of deterministic chaos, overthrowing two centuries of Laplace’s strict determinism in classical physics. Behind the veil of apparent randomness, though, many processes are highly ordered, following simple rules. Tools adapted from the theories of information and computation have brought physical science to the brink of automatically discovering hidden patterns and quantifying their structural complexity.
abstract_cn: 什么是模式？ 我们如何认识到从未见过的模式？ 量化模式的概念和形式化发现过程的形式化是物理科学的核心。 在过去的几十年中，物理＆＃8217; 对自然的观点缺乏结构性的不可预测性进行了重大革新，发现了确定性混乱，推翻了拉普拉斯严格的确定性两个世纪的古典物理学。 但是，在表面随机性的面纱背后，许多过程遵循简单的规则是高度有序的。 根据信息和计算理论改编的工具使物理科学处于自动发现隐藏模式并量化其结构复杂性的边缘。

title: Communities, modules and large-scale structure in networks
title_cn: 网络中的社区，模块和大规模结构
abstract: Networks, also called graphs by mathematicians, provide a useful abstraction of the structure of many complex systems, ranging from social systems and computer networks to biological networks and the state spaces of physical systems. In the past decade there have been significant advances in experiments to determine the topological structure of networked systems, but there remain substantial challenges in extracting scientific understanding from the large quantities of data produced by the experiments. A variety of basic measures and metrics are available that can tell us about small-scale structure in networks, such as correlations, connections and recurrent patterns, but it is considerably more difficult to quantify structure on medium and large scales, to understand the ‘big picture’. Important progress has been made, however, within the past few years, a selection of which is reviewed here.
abstract_cn: 网络，也被数学家称为图，它为许多复杂系统的结构提供了有用的抽象，范围从社会系统和计算机网络到生物网络和物理系统的状态空间。 在过去的十年中，确定网络系统的拓扑结构的实验取得了重大进展，但是在从实验产生的大量数据中提取科学理解方面仍然存在重大挑战。 可以使用各种基本度量和指标来告诉我们网络中的小规模结构，例如相关性，连接性和循环模式，但是要了解＆＃ 8216;大图景。 但是，在过去的几年中，已经取得了重要的进展，此处对其中的一些内容进行了回顾。

title: Modelling dynamical processes in complex socio-technical systems
title_cn: 在复杂的社会技术系统中对动态过程进行建模
abstract: In recent years the increasing availability of computer power and informatics tools has enabled the gathering of reliable data quantifying the complexity of socio-technical systems. Data-driven computational models have emerged as appropriate tools to tackle the study of dynamical phenomena as diverse as epidemic outbreaks, information spreading and Internet packet routing. These models aim at providing a rationale for understanding the emerging tipping points and nonlinear properties that often underpin the most interesting characteristics of socio-technical systems. Here, using diffusion and contagion phenomena as prototypical examples, we review some of the recent progress in modelling dynamical processes that integrates the complex features and heterogeneities of real-world systems.
abstract_cn: 近年来，计算机功能和信息学工具的可用性不断提高，使得收集可靠的数据成为可能，从而量化了社会技术系统的复杂性。 数据驱动的计算模型已经成为应对诸如流行病暴发，信息传播和互联网数据包路由等各种动态现象研究的适当工具。 这些模型旨在为理解新兴的临界点和非线性特性提供理论依据，而这些临界点和非线性特性通常是社会技术系统最有趣的特征。 在这里，我们以扩散和传染现象为例，回顾了动力学过程建模的最新进展，这些过程整合了现实世界系统的复杂特征和异构性。

title: Networks formed from interdependent networks
title_cn: 由相互依存的网络组成的网络
abstract: Complex networks appear in almost every aspect of science and technology. Although most results in the field have been obtained by analysing isolated networks, many real-world networks do in fact interact with and depend on other networks. The set of extensive results for the limiting case of non-interacting networks holds only to the extent that ignoring the presence of other networks can be justified. Recently, an analytical framework for studying the percolation properties of interacting networks has been developed. Here we review this framework and the results obtained so far for connectivity properties of ‘networks of networks’ formed by interdependent random networks.
abstract_cn: 复杂的网络几乎出现在科学技术的各个方面。 尽管该领域的大多数结果都是通过分析隔离的网络获得的，但实际上许多实际网络确实与其他网络交互并依赖其他网络。 对于非交互网络的限制情况，一组广泛的结果仅在以下情况下才成立：忽略其他网络的存在是合理的。 最近，已经开发了用于研究交互网络的渗透特性的分析框架。 在这里，我们回顾了此框架以及到目前为止针对＆networks; networks＆＃8217;的连接属性获得的结果。 由相互依存的随机网络组成。

title: Attoclock reveals natural coordinates of the laser-induced tunnelling current flow in atoms

title: Enhanced electric conductivity at ferroelectric vortex cores in BiFeO3
title_cn: BiFeO3中铁电涡流核的电导率提高
abstract: Topological defects in ferroic materials are attracting much attention both as a playground of unique physical phenomena and for potential applications in reconfigurable electronic devices. Here, we explore electronic transport at artificially created ferroelectric vortices in BiFeO3 thin films. The creation of one-dimensional conductive channels activated at voltages as low as 1 V is demonstrated. We study the electronic as well as the static and dynamic polarization structure of several topological defects using a combination of first-principles and phase-field modelling. The modelling predicts that the core structure can undergo a reversible transformation into a metastable twist structure, extending charged domain walls segments through the film thickness. The vortex core is therefore a dynamic conductor controlled by the coupled response of polarization and electron–mobile-vacancy subsystems with external bias. This controlled creation of conductive one-dimensional channels suggests a pathway for the design and implementation of integrated oxide electronic devices based on domain patterning.
abstract_cn: 铁磁性材料中的拓扑缺陷作为独特物理现象的场所以及可重构电子设备的潜在应用都引起了人们的广泛关注。在这里，我们探索在BiFeO 3 薄膜中的人工产生的铁电涡流中的电子传输。演示了在低至1＆＃V的电压下激活的一维导电通道的创建。我们结合第一原理和相场建模研究了几种拓扑缺陷的电子以及静态和动态极化结构。该模型预测核心结构可以经历可逆转变为亚稳扭曲结构，从而使带电畴壁段延伸穿过薄膜厚度。因此，涡旋芯是一种动态导体，受极化和外部偏置的电子和空位子系统的耦合响应控制。导电一维通道的这种受控创建为基于域构图的集成氧化物电子器件的设计和实现提供了一条途径。

title: Field-induced polarization of Dirac valleys in bismuth
title_cn: 铋的狄拉克山谷的场致极化
abstract: The electronic structure of certain crystal lattices can contain multiple degenerate ’valleys’ for their charge carriers to occupy. This valley degree of freedom could be useful in the development of electronic devices. The principal challenge in the development of ’valleytronics’ is to lift the valley degeneracy of charge carriers in a controlled way. Here we show that in semi-metallic bismuth the flow of Dirac fermions along the trigonal axis is extremely sensitive to the orientation of in-plane magnetic field. Thus, a rotatable magnetic field can be used as a valley valve to tune the contribution of each valley to the total conductivity. At high temperature and low magnetic field, bismuth’s three valleys are interchangeable and the three-fold symmetry of its lattice is maintained. As the temperature is decreased or the magnetic field increased, this symmetry is spontaneously lost. This loss may be an experimental manifestation of the recently proposed valley-nematic Fermi liquid state.
abstract_cn: 某些晶格的电子结构可以包含多个简并的“谷”。供他们的电荷携带者使用。这种低谷的自由度在电子设备的开发中可能是有用的。 Valleytronics开发中的主要挑战是要以可控的方式消除电荷载流子的谷值退化。在这里，我们表明在半金属铋中，狄拉克费米子沿三角轴的流动对平面内磁场的方向极为敏感。因此，可将旋转磁场用作谷底阀以调节每个谷底对总电导率的贡献。在高温和低磁场下，铋的三个谷是可互换的，并保持其晶格的三重对称性。随着温度降低或磁场增加，这种对称性自然消失。这种损失可能是最近提出的谷向列型费米液态的实验表现。

title: Collisionless shocks in laser-produced plasma generate monoenergetic high-energy proton beams
title_cn: 激光产生的等离子体中的无碰撞冲击产生单能高能质子束
abstract: Compact and affordable ion accelerators based on laser-produced plasmas have potential applications in many fields of science and medicine. However, the requirement of producing focusable, narrow-energy-spread, energetic beams has proved to be challenging. Here we demonstrate that laser-driven collisionless shocks can accelerate proton beams to ∼20 MeV with extremely narrow energy spreads of about 1% and low emittances. This is achieved using a linearly polarized train of multiterawatt CO2 laser pulses interacting with a gas-jet target. Computer simulations show that laser-heated electrons launch a collisionless shock that overtakes and reflects the protons in the slowly expanding hydrogen plasma, resulting in a narrow energy spectrum. Simulations predict the production of ∼200 MeV protons needed for radiotherapy by using current laser technology. These results open a way for developing a compact and versatile, high-repetition-rate ion source for medical and other applications.
abstract_cn: 基于激光产生等离子体的紧凑且价格合理的离子加速器在许多科学和医学领域具有潜在的应用。然而，事实证明，产生可聚焦的，窄能量扩展的高能光束的要求极具挑战性。在这里，我们证明了激光驱动的无碰撞冲击可以将质子束加速到＆＃8764; 20＆＃8201; MeV，能量散布非常窄，约为1％，并且发射率低。这是通过使用与气体靶标相互作用的多兆瓦CO 2 激光脉冲的线性偏振光来实现的。计算机模拟表明，激光加热的电子会发出无碰撞的冲击，该冲击会覆盖并反射缓慢扩展的氢等离子体中的质子，从而导致能谱变窄。模拟预测通过使用当前的激光技术产生放射疗法所需的＆＃8764; 200＆＃8201; MeV质子。这些结果为开发用于医疗和其他应用的紧凑，多功能，高重复率离子源开辟了道路。
